mapper.insert: insert into wk_words( word_seq, category, word, meaning, image, user_seq ) values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(word_seq),0)+1 FROM wk_words), #{category}, #{word}, #{meaning}, #{image}, (select seq from WK_USERS where userId = #{userId}) )
mapper.select: select seq, (select seq from wk_users where userid = #{userid}) user_seq, category_seq, title , (select userid from wk_users where userid = #{userid}) userid from wk_vocabularies where user_seq = (select seq from wk_users where userid = #{userid})

select S.seq word_seq, S.CATEGORY_SEQ category_seq, W.WORD word, W.MEANING meaning, W.IMAGE image, u.userid userid, V.REGISTERDATE registerdate, V.UPDATEDATE updatedate, S.TITLE title from wk_vocalist V, wk_vocabularies S, WK_WORDS W, WK_USERS U where V.VOCA_SEQ = S.SEQ AND S.USER_SEQ = (select seq from wk_users where userid = #{userid}) and v.word_seq = w.word_seq and S.SEQ = #{seq}
